snippet: A North Korean chemist deported from Malaysia accused police of threatening to kill his family unless he confessed to the assassination of the half-brother of North Korea's leader, calling it a plot to tarnish his country's honor....

headline.main: North Korean Suspect in Airport Murder to Be Deported From Malaysia and Not Allowed Back
headline.print_headline: North Korean Suspect in Airport Murder to Be Deported From Malaysia and Not Allowed Back

lead_paragraph: A North Korean chemist deported from Malaysia accused police of threatening to kill his family unless he confessed to the assassination of the half-brother of North Korea's leader, calling it a plot to tarnish his country's honor.
